text: Gar'hita ta ya diye tara nijedera aâ€Œtma binimaya kareche ye jan'ya allah ya abatarana karechena ta tara abisbasa kare bidbesera base -- ye allah tamra krpabasatah uha abatirna karabena tamra dasadera madhye yake iccha karena tara kache! Ta'i tara rosera upara rosa tene analo. Ara abisbasidera jan'ya rayeche lanchanadayaka sasti.
